body_html:
I'm not sure which supposed to be the default lib for cudnn.

I copied the dylib into:
/Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-9.2/lib/

and the .h in:
/Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-9.2/include/

While the installer was correctly finding the CUDA library, it wasn't finding the cuDNN lib until I set those variables. (I'm using OSX)

body:
I'm not sure which supposed to be the default lib for cudnn.

I copied the dylib into:
/Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-9.2/lib/

and the .h in:
/Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-9.2/include/

While the installer was correctly finding the CUDA library, it wasn't finding the cuDNN lib until I set those variables. (I'm using OSX)
